lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Dyo yata sinha swa\nMaiju yata hyangu swa\nBhaju yata jun kera swa x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Haa re siramai tata\nThagu lapu kyawochiya\nlyuni nha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Lyama daju dhau ga: hai\nLyase tata wahla baju hai\nLami maiju gwa gwe jwona wai x2

lyrics: Haa re siramai tata\nThagu lapu kyawochiya\nlyuni nha

lyrics: Dyo yata sya baji\nMaiju yata luya baji\nBhaju yata tiki baji nha

lyrics: Swa chapta ka se nise\nJha kwosa wose nise\nMohni na kehna jita nha x2
